Package gui

Class UserPreferences

java.lang.Object
gui.UserPreferences
public class UserPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
This class gets and sets java preferences for the ALFAT user preferences. User preferences require a key name & a default fallback value The default fallback should come from general settings

      public void setPreferredFileType​(java.lang.String fileType)
      Set the preferred file type file type must match the file filter format e.g. "type1,type2;type1" or "type1;type1,type2". This function DOES not check.
